fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.util.algo.geometricAlgorithms

Class GeometryFactory

  • Object
    • GeometryFactory

  • public class GeometryFactory
extends Object
    This class is a factory that contains static methods to build specific kind of geometries as IPolygon or ILineString (e.g. a circle, a triangle).
    Author:
    GTouya

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeometryFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IPolygon buildCircle(IDirectPosition centre, double radius, int nbSegments)
      Creates a Circle polygon from its centre and radius.
      static IPolygon buildHexagon(IDirectPosition center, double width)
      Creates a regular hexagon parallel to the X axis.
      static IPolygon buildParallelogram(ILineSegment segment, Vecteur vect)
      Creates a Parallelogram polygon from a segment translated by a vector.
      static IPolygon buildRectangle(IDirectPosition upperLeftCorner, double length, double width)
      Creates a rectangle polygon parallel to axes from the upper left corner, the length (x coordinate difference) and the width (y coordinate difference).
      static ILineString buildSubLine(ILineString line, IDirectPosition pt1, IDirectPosition pt2)
      Builds a sub-line from a line and two of its vertices.
      static IPolygon buildTriangle(IDirectPosition pt1, IDirectPosition pt2, IDirectPosition pt3)
      Creates a triangle polygon from three points.

        public GeometryFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • buildCircle

        public static IPolygon buildCircle(IDirectPosition centre,
                                   double radius,
                                   int nbSegments)
        Creates a Circle polygon from its centre and radius. Uses a buffer to create the circle so the number of segments of the polygon is required.
        Parameters:
        centre - the centre of the polygon circle
        radius - the radius of the circle
        nbSegments - the number of segments of the polygon circle
        Returns:
        the IPolygon circle geometry

      • buildParallelogram

        public static IPolygon buildParallelogram(ILineSegment segment,
                                          Vecteur vect)
        Creates a Parallelogram polygon from a segment translated by a vector.
        Parameters:
        segment - the segment base of the parallelogram
        vect - the vector to translate the segment
        Returns:
        a parallelogram IPolygon geometry

      • buildTriangle

        public static IPolygon buildTriangle(IDirectPosition pt1,
                                     IDirectPosition pt2,
                                     IDirectPosition pt3)
        Creates a triangle polygon from three points.
        Parameters:
        segment - the segment base of the parallelogram
        vect - the vector to translate the segment
        Returns:
        a parallelogram IPolygon geometry

      • buildSubLine

        public static ILineString buildSubLine(ILineString line,
                                       IDirectPosition pt1,
                                       IDirectPosition pt2)
        Builds a sub-line from a line and two of its vertices.
        Parameters:
        line -
        pt1 -
        pt2 -
        Returns:

      • buildRectangle

        public static IPolygon buildRectangle(IDirectPosition upperLeftCorner,
                                      double length,
                                      double width)
        Creates a rectangle polygon parallel to axes from the upper left corner, the length (x coordinate difference) and the width (y coordinate difference).
        Parameters:
        upperLeftCorner - the segment base of the parallelogram
        length - the length of the X axis parallel side of the rectangle
        width - the length of the Y axis parallel side of the rectangle
        Returns:
        a rectangle IPolygon geometry

      • buildHexagon

        public static IPolygon buildHexagon(IDirectPosition center,
                                    double width)
        Creates a regular hexagon parallel to the X axis. Width being the perpendicular distances from one side to the side opposite.
        Parameters:
        center -
        width -
        Returns:
